DOC.brief_summary: Given clinical damage cause error commonly make dosage handle glass ionomer cement ( GIC ) high viscosity powder-liquid type , use encapsulate ionomer recommend final restoration . However , initial cost encapsulate MIC high compare material handle manually . The objective randomized study ( 1 ) reveal cost-effective long run , encapsulate CIV Riva Self Cure Equia use restorative material atraumatic restoration ( Atraumatic Restorative Treatment ) , ( 2 ) ass whether type cavity ( occlusal occlusal-proximal ) influence longevity atraumatic restoration use encapsulated IC , ( 3 ) ass whether child 's caries experience influence longevity atraumatic restoration GIC encapsulate . Children , age 3 7 , select Tietê-SP municipality . Randomization perform stratified manner condition : type cavity caries experience . 122 ART restoration perform use encapsulate CIV - Riva Self Cure - SDI Equia -CG Corp . The restoration evaluate 6 , 12 18 month two trained examiner blind group ( intra- inter-rater agreement 0.7 ) . To verify survival restoration use Kaplan-Meier survival analysis log-rank test . To evaluate association longevity variable Cox regression test apply . For cost analysis use analysis variance .
DOC.brief_title: Cost-efficacy Atraumatic Restorations ( ART ) Using Different Encapsulated Glass Ionomer Cement
